skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Front-end developer specializing in mobile and web development, proficient in HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, React.js, and Flutter.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Experienced backend developer adept in Node.js/Express.js for scalable server-side apps/APIs.

skills.title: Database
skills.description: Experienced in Firebase, MongoDB, MySQL, SQL, and Sequelize. Skilled in data design, management, and optimization for diverse applications.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Experienced designer crafting intuitive interfaces for mobile and web. Proficient in wireframing, prototyping, and Skilled in Figma and Sketch.
